column1: Art Institute of Chicago////That being said
column2: the Art Institute didn't particularly impress me in any way
column4: either.  It was just another art collection.  It could definitely be considered in the big-leagues with other super-museums
column5: though it may not be at the level of
column7: the Louvre.  The Art Institute had smatterings of big-name pieces from Seurat
column11: -- enough to keep it interesting -- but still
column12: a lot of (what I would consider) "filler."
